import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBoxOpen, faCartArrowDown, faChartPie, faChevronDown, faClipboard, faCommentDots, faFileAlt, faPlus, faRocket, faStore } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Col, Card, Row, Button, Dropdown } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import { ChoosePhotoWidget, ProfileCardWidget } from "../../components/Widgets"; import { ProfileForm } from "../../components/Forms"; import Profile3 from "../../assets/img/team/profile-picture-3.jpg"; export default () => { const [link, setLink] = useState("") let handleReferralCopy = (e) => { e.preventDefault() navigator.clipboard.writeText(link) } return ( <> {/*
New Document Message Product Subscription Plan
Reports Products Customers Orders Console All Reports
*/}
Welcome to Vangaurd Investments - your personal client area.
Your referral ID: handleReferralCopy(e)}>Click to copy referral link
); };
